name: Morgan Williams
title: Data Engineer & Architect for Big Data Solutions

experience.title: Lead Data Engineer
description: Designed and implemented scalable ETL pipelines using Airflow and Spark, processing petabytes of data.
Optimized data transformation workflows, reducing processing time by 70%.
Architected data warehousing solutions with DuckDB and PostgreSQL, enhancing query performance and data accessibility.
Managed a team of data engineers, leading to a 50% increase in overall productivity.

experience.title: Data Engineer
description: Developed data ingestion processes using Python and SQL, ensuring data integrity and consistency.
Integrated AWS services (S3, EMR) for scalable storage and processing solutions.
Collaborated with data science teams to prepare datasets for machine learning models, improving model accuracy by 20%.
Implemented data security protocols in compliance with industry standards.

education.summary: Data Engineering with Python and SQL
